about_the_game:
"Japanese Rail Sim" is a live-action video and a realistically reproduced driver's seat.
It is a railway simulation game where you can experience full-scale railway driving.
Easy operation just by operating the mascon and the brake,
Anyone can feel free to feel like a driver.
Let's enjoy the scenic Japanese scenery with [real] images!

In the trial version, you can test drive the Demachiyanagi >> Mototanaka section
down the Kurama Line.

Experience the Eizan train with full HD live-action video!

The stage of this work is the local line "Eizan Electric Railway" in Kyoto, which is very popular as a tourist destination.
Nature is abundant, including the "Maple Tunnel," which is famous for its autumn colors.
Run in a quaint landscape from the city to the mountains.

High-definition, high-definition full HD live-action video shot locally
You can even feel the air.

Smooth video playback and realistically reproduced driver's seat

You can feel the immersive feeling to the maximum.

Full volume! Eizan Electric Railway All lines / up and down lines can be enjoyed many times!
Includes two lines, the Eizan Main Line and the Kurama Line.
Even on the same route, the slopes are different on the up and down, so you can enjoy it repeatedly.

In addition, you can experience the scenery of early summer and autumn in Kyoto by recording images of the fresh green season.

Enjoy the difference in driving with two vehicles!

A vehicle that represents the Eizan Electric Railway,
It is possible to operate two vehicles, "Observation Train Kirara" and "Sightseeing Train Hiei".
Let's drive while enjoying the difference.

From home to Kyoto anytime

There are many sightseeing spots along the Eizan Electric Railway, such as historical temples and shrines.
Also includes a "guidebook" that introduces the highlights along the railway line!

Don't miss the "Tetsutabi Material Collection" that includes information on successive vehicles.
Please enjoy the travel along the railway line as well as driving.

Optimized for PC

Supports all keyboard operations and mouse menu operations.
Of course, it also fully supports controller operation!
You can enjoy it with your favorite operation.

Compatible with 3 screen sizes and trading cards!
